contents.text:
Looks like there are still a lot of recipes
out there that I don't know yet.

It feels like the world of cooking extends
endlessly past the horizon, just like
Hyrule itself.

Recipes of the Hyrulean royal family...
If there are more of them out there,
I'd like to try them.

I think I'll continue to practice my
cooking on unsuspecting inn patrons like
yourself.
